text: Avgustovka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Radyschevskoye Rural Settlement of Novouzensky District, Saratov Oblast, Russia. The population was 67 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The village is located 32 km west- south-west from Novouzensk, on the left bank of the Maly Uzen River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Saratov Oblast
title: Avgustovka, Saratov Oblast
